body:
Has anyone ever had problems building Perl with the Intel compilers? I'm seeing:
```
ld: cannot find -lm
ld: cannot find -lcilkrts
ld: cannot find -lc
ld: cannot find -ldl
ld: cannot find -lc
ld: cannot find -lm
ld: cannot find -lcilkrts
```
I've tried with both Intel 16 and 17.
title: Unable to build Perl with Intel
